h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Earth Wolf
content: This strange looking yaoguai has a lot of rushing attacks that are hard to get a sense of due to its attack patterns, and you’ll want to utilize your Immobilize spell for help interrupting these when possible.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Sandgate_Village_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Sandgate Village Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Village Entrance' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Mini-Boss Fight - Earth Wolf'.
The content is as follows:
This strange looking yaoguai has a lot of rushing attacks that are hard to get a sense of due to its attack patterns, and you’ll want to utilize your Immobilize spell for help interrupting these when possible.
